documentation_candidates.limitation_statement: Air ticket policies do not support indefinite carry-over of unused balances between renewal cycles. Unused ticket allowances expire at the end of each policy renewal period.
documentation_candidates.user_impact: Customers must carefully calculate total requests across multi-year cycles (e.g., 5 requests/year × 5-year cycle = 25 total requests). Unused requests in early years are lost.
documentation_candidates.workaround: Set total number of requests to the product of annual requests and renewal cycle duration (e.g., 5 × 5 = 25 for a 5-year policy with 5 annual requests)
documentation_candidates.guide_section: Air Ticket Policy Configuration > Renewal Cycles and Request Allocation

documentation_candidates.summary: Air tickets - Booked tickets notification (tagging LM when not in approval flow OR workflow on ticket requests)
documentation_candidates.limitation_statement: The platform cannot notify or tag line managers about air ticket booking completion when they are outside the formal approval workflow. Air ticket application is not available in Workflows to configure automated notifications on ticket processing.
documentation_candidates.user_impact: Line managers lack visibility into ticket processing status when they submit requests for employees, creating communication gaps and requiring manual follow-up.
documentation_candidates.workaround: Include line managers in the air ticket approval workflow to enable notifications, or use email-based communication outside the platform
documentation_candidates.guide_section: Air Ticket Requests > Notifications and Tracking for Proxy Requesters

documentation_candidates.summary: As an employee I want to manage my air ticket requests from my air tickets
documentation_candidates.limitation_statement: The platform does not provide a unified interface for employees to manage air ticket requests across different policy states (inactive policies, missing hire/probation dates, ineligibility conditions).
documentation_candidates.user_impact: Employees have limited visibility and control over air ticket requests when policies are inactive or eligibility conditions are not satisfied.
documentation_candidates.workaround: Contact HR to ensure hire date and probation end date are complete in employee records, and verify auto-encashment policy is active before managing air ticket requests
documentation_candidates.guide_section: Air Ticket Management > Policy States and Eligibility Requirements

documentation_candidates.limitation_statement: The Expense Manager role has visibility to employee loans and air tickets beyond work expenses. The platform lacks granular permission controls to restrict Expense Manager access to only work-related expense data.
documentation_candidates.user_impact: Customers cannot restrict Expense Manager access to work expenses only, creating potential data privacy concerns and unintended visibility of sensitive employee financial information.
documentation_candidates.workaround: Educate Expense Managers about data confidentiality, or implement organizational policies restricting how they use visible data
documentation_candidates.guide_section: Role Permissions > Expense Manager Visibility Scope

documentation_candidates.summary: Letter requests - upload the document after stamping
documentation_candidates.limitation_statement: The platform does not support external document signing workflows for letter requests. Approved letter requests cannot be modified, attachments cannot be added to approved requests, and approved requests cannot be returned to pending status.
documentation_candidates.user_impact: Organizations requiring external document stamping or attestation must use email-based workarounds, creating inefficiency and reducing document traceability.
documentation_candidates.workaround: Download letter request while in pending status, have it stamped externally, and request HR to manually attach the signed document to the employee record outside the system
documentation_candidates.guide_section: Letter Requests > External Signing and Attestation Workflows

documentation_candidates.summary: Restricted People manager role - can still see other employees (out of assigned group)
documentation_candidates.limitation_statement: Employee group restrictions only apply to finance and payroll modules. People Manager and Adjustment Manager roles can view and edit employee details (work tab, documents, departments) for employees outside their assigned groups.
documentation_candidates.user_impact: Organizations cannot enforce department-level or group-based access control for HR modules, creating potential data privacy and organizational control issues.
documentation_candidates.workaround: Implement organizational policies and training to ensure People Managers respect group boundaries, or use external access control systems to supplement platform restrictions
documentation_candidates.guide_section: Employee Groups and Role Restrictions > Module Coverage and Limitations

excluded.summary: Limited access for employees to view other users
excluded.reason: Ticket describes a roadmap feature (Employee Grouping and Structures) under development by Platform team with no committed timeline. Not currently testable as feature is not yet available for HR modules.

excluded.summary: Need to delete the test air tickets processed
excluded.reason: Ticket documents a system limitation (processed air tickets cannot be deleted) with no UI mechanism to test. The limitation is a backend constraint, not a testable UI behavior or user-facing documentation value.
